channel.title: Cult spy gets canceled if you use telepathy
channel.description:
#### What happened? I used cult spy as apostle. The next day I used telepathy and whispers werent revealed. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I was supposed to read all whispers.
#### Steps to reproduce: Use telepathy after using maid spy.
#### Comments: Im not 100% sure telepathy was the cause of this bug, but it looks like the most likely cause.

item.title: Cult spy gets canceled if you use telepathy
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Can you check if it is still reoccurring after patch 1.1.2b?

item.title: Cult spy gets canceled if you use telepathy
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
What happened?

I used cult spy as apostle. The next day I used telepathy and whispers werent revealed.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I was supposed to read all whispers.

Steps to reproduce:

Use telepathy after using maid spy.

Comments:

Im not 100% sure telepathy was the cause of this bug, but it looks like the most likely cause.
